content.rendered:
The Cinder Volcano Raid Den is located behind the Braille Tablet in Cinder Volcano 2F.

If you need help solving the puzzle for this tablet then follow the tutorial here.

Location

Raid Pokémon

Pokémon Star Level

Magcargo 3-Star, 4-Star, and 5-Star
